text: <@U10SJMAHH>: I can’t comment on whether deploy is fully supported, I do have two comments
1) I know at least devmode based deploy is supported, as thats what I have been using
2) I find it helpful to just open the docs locally e.g. file:/// URL into chrome
the online docs have yet to work for me, but the documentation is fairly comprehensive if you can manage to find a way to render it
<@U19PSLZV1>: I know you can use security=off, but you still need to have the CA running
thats how I do most of my testing
